ruling: - If [[Kycoo the Ghost Destroyer]] is on your opponent's side of the field, you can activate [[Miracle Fusion]] if all the Fusion Material Monsters are on the field; however, if any of them are in the Graveyard, you cannot activate it.
- You can use fusion substitute monsters like [[King of the Swamp]] and [[Goddess with the Third Eye]] for [[Miracle Fusion]].
- [[Miracle Fusion]] does not target. You select and remove the monsters during resolution.
